body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Dance Pro Studio support. My name is Adam Rivera, and I am here to assist you. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Adam, my name is Marie Roberts.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marie. How can I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is marie.roberts@example.com and my phone number is five five five - seven eight nine - one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marie, for sharing your contact details. Is there anything specific you would like to know or ask regarding Dance Pro Studio?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have a question about the payment options available and if there are any upcoming dance events scheduled.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Certainly, Marie. We offer payment options including credit card, PayPal, and bank transfer. Regarding upcoming events, we currently have a ballet performance scheduled next month. Is there anything else you would like to know?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Adam.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Marie. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Thank you for contacting Dance Pro Studio support. Have a great day!
